subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dan Cleary had two goals Sunday for the Detroit Red Wings, who scored three times in the third period to pull away in a 5-2 victory over the visiting Chicago Blackhawks in Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Dan Cleary had two goals Sunday for the Detroit Red Wings, who scored three times in the third period to pull away in a 5-2 victory over the visiting Chicago Blackhawks in Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
